articles.author: Victor Jack
articles.title: Putin to Trump: Call me maybe - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The Russian leader said he was ready to compromise with the incoming U.S. president on ending the Kremlin’s war in Ukraine.
articles.content: His comments come as Ukraine faces increasingly difficulties on the front line and braces for the return to power by Trump, who has previously vowed to end the conflict in one day. Kyiv, however, doe… [+1393 chars]
